title: Majority of Americans don't trust Facebook - Reuters poll
text:
Majority of Americans don't trust Facebook - Reuters poll 3:38pm BST - 02:03 
Fewer than half of Americans trust Facebook to obey U.S. privacy laws, according to a Reuters/Ipsos poll released on Sunday, illustrating the challenge facing the social media network after a scandal over its handling of personal information. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
